籤詩版本二:
Cold water uncooked boiling soup
Not cold, not hot, warm and cool
To do nothing else in the world
In order to be pregnant and become strong in all kinds of arts
詩意: This hexagram is a symbol of good use of things. Everything is stable and good.
解曰: Prisoners are pardoned. A disease meets a good doctor. Seek wealth and hope. Noble instructions.
籤詩故事一:
◇Lintong Rescue
Late Sui Dynasty. King Li Yuan of the Tang Dynasty passed by the tree planting hillock at the foot of Lintong Mountain. Suddenly, countless strong men rushed out of the forest, blocking the way with long spears and axes, intending to kill them. Li Yuan was surrounded and it was very critical.
At this time, Shubao was about to fall asleep in Wuyuan Temple. He was surprised when he suddenly heard the sound of men and horses shouting for death outside the temple. He immediately mounted his horse and ran to the middle of the mountain. There was smoke and dust everywhere at the bottom of the mountain, and there were shouts of killing.
With lightning speed, Shu Bao rushed in and killed dozens of people in a row. The enemies fled in all directions.
Saved Li Yuan's family. That is, he was reused by the king of Tang Dynasty. He became the founding hero of the Tang Dynasty.
聖意:
The house is safe.
Good luck to itself.
Asking for wealth, then.
Transaction completed.
Marriage.
Rokko Male.
Pedestrians arrive.
Field silkworms are ripe.


The six animals are prosperous.
Looking for someone to come.
The lawsuit was dismissed.
Good luck with migration.
Lost things are found immediately.
Disease: Safe.
The mountain tomb is very auspicious.
